teaquotes.text: You can never get a cup of tea large enough or a book long enough to suit me.
teaquotes.author: C.S. Lewis

teaquotes.text: I say let the world go to hell, but I should always have my tea.
teaquotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky, Notes from Underground

teaquotes.text: My hour for tea is half-past five, and my buttered toast waits for nobody.
teaquotes.author: Wilkie Collins, The Woman in White

teaquotes.text: Arthur blinked at the screens and felt he was missing something important. Suddenly he realized what it was. "Is there any tea on this spaceship?" he asked.
teaquotes.author: Douglas Adams, The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
